message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $140. I think it's a great deal for something you'll find valuable.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $130 is too low for me. How about we split the difference and settle at $135?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was really hoping to get closer to the $125 mark. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
